channel.title: Posts on Steven Korvin's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Steven Korvin's Website

item.title: Move to Anatole Theme
item.description:
With the uBlogger theme no longer maintained, I have moved this site to the Anatole Hugo theme, which can be found here: https://github.com/lxndrblz/anatole

Credit for this theme goes to all contributors behind its development.

item.title: EVC Project Photographs
item.description: I tried to make photographs of the Electric Vehicle Conversion project look snazzy in the uBlogger Hugo theme. I’m just going to direct you to an album in my PixelFed account instead: http://link.stevenkorvin.com/PG8kwp
